texts.Name: Name
texts.RestoreToDefaultMessage: Are you sure? This action will convert the content to the default value.
texts.TemplateContentRestoredToDefault: Template content restored to the default value.
texts.InlineContentDescription:
This template uses inline localization. You can use the L function to localize a text, like {{L "Hello"}}. If you still want to define a completely new template for a culture, use the "Customize per culture" button.
To get more information about syntax and other details, please check the Text Templates documentation.
texts.Feature:TextManagementEnableDescription: Enable text management system in the application.
